title: Amy Asks The Question 'Would You Sue If Your Child Was Given The Wrong Vaccine?' + Mailbag: Wife Sending “Heart Eyes” Emoji to A Celebrity (Wednesday Part 1)
itunes:title: Amy Asks The Question 'Would You Sue If Your Child Was Given The Wrong Vaccine?' + Mailbag: Wife Sending “Heart Eyes” Emoji to A Celebrity (Wednesday Part 1)
description:
Amy shares a story about whose friend’s baby was given the COVID vaccine instead of a flu shot. She asks the question if you would sue in the situation. In Bobby’s mailbag, a husband is concerned with his wife sending a celebrity heart eye emojis..is that okay?? Plus a caller has a question about what is acceptable if a celebrity moves in next door.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
